sourcesContent: import './index.scss' import { TagCloud } from 'react-tagcloud' const AnimatedSphere = () => { const data = [ { value: 'JavaScript', count: 38 }, { value: 'ReactJS', count: 30 }, { value: 'HTML5', count: 33 }, { value: 'CSS3', count: 30 }, { value: 'SASS', count: 32 }, { value: 'Bootstrap', count: 24 }, { value: 'TailwindCSS', count: 27 }, { value: 'Webpack', count:20 }, { value: 'Redux', count:28 }, { value: 'Nodejs', count: 22 }, { value: 'Express.js', count: 25 }, { value: 'React Router', count: 25 }, { value: 'Figma', count: 20 }, { value: 'Photoshop', count: 22 }, { value: 'Premiere Pro', count: 20 }, { value: 'SQL Server', count: 25 }, { value: 'MongoDB', count: 18 }, { value: 'NPM', count: 20 }, ] const customRenderer = (tag, size, color) => ( {tag.value} ) return ( <> ) } export default AnimatedSphere
